title: Log in screen
body:
I really liked the song for the login screen with the Star Guardians{{champion:117}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:99}}{{champion:222}} {{champion:40}} . But, the song and art was really good. I just wanted to say they did a good job. That has become one of my favorite login in screens. I am curious as to how many liked it. Let me know me know at the bottom. 

Personally, I liked the anime feel of the whole log in screen.

replies.body:
I won't vote (due to clear potential bias, hehe), but I gotta say I love the screen too! I actually  animate login screens, but mostly for new champions+updates now... so it's always great seeing such an epic login screen from a skin event like this landing in my client all of a sudden!

I couldn't login for about a song loop and a half...too good....{{summoner:3}} 
We are glad you like it though! I'll pass on your praise :)

PS: First time posting with red name finally, hope I am doing this right XD
Was the Star Guardian Login made by a different team? The art style is noticeably different then the one you've been sticking to for the past few years.

Not really, the login was made by the team that usually handles the skins.
I think the styling difference you mentioned was made to keep it feeling close to "Burning Bright" and the anime inspirations!
I've replayed the song soooooo many times. It's one of my top 5 favorite LoL songs for sure, up there with Project Ashe and Ekko, The Boy Who Shattered Time.
